data.title: Dr. Albert Abraham Michelson, the first American to receive the Nobel Prize in sciences, showing a small, metal instrument, ca.1930
data.meta_description: Photograph of Dr. Albert Abraham Michelson, the first American to receive the Nobel Prize in sciences, showing a small, metal instrument, ca.1930. Dr. Michelson stands on the left in a dark suit facing the small, metal instrument which stands on a wooden plank on the right. A large, dark pipe runs behind them with disk-like grooves around its circumference.
